entry.title: Tunnel Anewala Hai - 36 China Town - Johnny Lever, Tanaaz Currim, Shahid Kapoor & Kareena Kapoor
entry.content: Watch the hit comedy scene "Tunnel Anewala Hai" - 36 China Town - Shahid Kapoor & Kareena Kapoor from Subhash Ghai's suspense comedy film 36 China Town Directed by - Abbas-Mustan, Starring Akshaye Khanna, Kareena Kapoor, Shahid Kapoor, Isha Koppikar, Tanushree Dutta, Upen Patel, Priyanka Chopra, Paresh Rawal, Johnny Lever, Tanaaz Currim ,Payal Rohatgi, Music by - Himesh Reshammiya.The film is a murder mystery that follows the investigation of a police officer trying to find the killer of a wealthy casino owner, Sonia Chang lives in her huge mansion 36 China Town.Click on http://www.rajshri.com/Listing/Movies/Free-Hindi-Movies-New-Classic-Bollywood-Blockbuster-Films to watch full length Bollywood films absolutely Free!!

entry.title: Tezaab - Chai Ke Saath Naashta - Johnny Lever & Annu Kapoor - Bollywood Comedy Scenes
entry.content:
Watch Tezaab - Chai Ke Saath Naashta - Johnny Lever & Annu Kapoor - Bollywood Comedy Scenes. Bollywood Superhit Film Tezaab - 1988 was Directed By : N Chandra featuring Anil Kapoor, Maduri Dixit, Anupam Kher, Chunkey Pandey, Johnny Lever, Kiran Kumar, Suresh Oberoi & Annu Kapoor. Music Directed By: Lakshmikant Pyarelal. Synopsis : Mahesh Deshmukh (Anil Kapoor) has joined the nation's armed forces as that he can honestly and patriotically serve the country. During his college days he has a run-in with fellow-collegian Mohini (Madhuri Dixit). A bet between his friends and himself ends up with him falling in love with Mohini, who subsequently realizes that he indeed has fallen in love with her, and she too reciprocates. Mohini's dad (Anupam Kher) is an alcoholic and wishes that Mohini takes up dancing and prostitution so that he can get his daily dose of alchol. Mohini attempts to take refuge with Mahesh, however, cirumstances tangle Mahesh to such an extent that he is arrested, charged, and sentenced to stay away from Bombay city limits. When Mahesh returns, it is no longer the honest, and patriotic Mahesh, but a gangster named Munna, who has many old scores to settle.

entry.content:

entry.title: Shraap Deta Hun, Tu Kutti Ban Ja - Johnny Lever, Himani Shivpuri - Comedy Scene - Yaar Gaddar
entry.content:
Watch the comedy scene "Shraap Deta Hun, Tu Kutti Ban Ja" from the bollywood romantic movie Yaar Gaddar (1994) Starring Saif Ali Khan, Mithun Chakraborty, Somi Ali & Prem Chopra. Directed by Parvesh Mehra. Produced by Umesh Mehra. Music by Anu Malik.

This scene shows Police Constable (Johnny Lever) meeting a group of priests and requesting them to do black magic to rid of his inspector wife Pushpa (Himani Shivpuri) who is a nagger. Pushpa who is in search of some con men mistakenly identifies these priests as those conmen and starts bad mouthing them. One of the priests gets angry and curses Pushpa of becoming a dog because she accused a holy person of being conman. Minutes later Pushpa starts behaving like a dog. Is it for real, watch the hilarious scene to know more:
